title: Wait, is this a bug or are these skins acutally going?
body:
Is this just a client bug or are these skins actually getting taken away from the store?
http://i.imgur.com/t3DmdZl.jpg
[](http://i.imgur.com/t3DmdZl.jpg)

replies.body: This is intended. The Legacy Vault is opened for a bit. :]
Katey, why exactly are skins put in the vault?  Is it because they don't sell?  Is it because of store crowding issues?
I think he meant that some normally available skins (such as prom queen annie or rune wars renekton) are in that category, as to say they are becoming legacy.

Oh! Yes, 21 skins will be added to the Legacy Vault. You can find more information and a list of the legacy skins being added [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/battle-boss-blitzcrank-sends-skins-hiding).
That would be a shame. Some of those skins area really cool.
Probably just a clean up, they've been doing it for awhile now. New skins come out so that leaves older skins obsolete, and a couple skins get put into the Legacy vault!
i would also like to know
